Key Match Events: The benches and bullpens emptied after Edwin Uceta hit Nick Castellanos with a pitch, leading to a scuffle between the Phillies and Rays.
Uceta was ejected from the game.
Post-Match Reflections: Phillies manager Rob Thomson described the emotions spilling over in the eighth inning as 'boys being boys.'
Rays manager Kevin Cash apologized to Nick Castellanos after the game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Phillies won 9-4 against the Rays.
The Phillies reduced their magic number to 10 to clinch the N.L. East.
Others: Nick Castellanos compared Edwin Uceta to his two-year-old after being hit by a pitch, saying it was like his child throwing a fit when their dessert was taken away.
